en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Beijing

en: The Secretary for Justice, Ms Teresa Cheng, SC, will depart on a duty visit to Beijing tomorrow evening (April 26).

While in Beijing, Ms Cheng will pay courtesy calls on the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council, the National Development and Reform Commission, the Legislative Affairs Commission and the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Basic Law Committee of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress as well as the Ministry of Justice.
She will also take the opportunity to meet with representatives of the Mainland arbitration sector to enhance exchanges on legal and arbitration services.
Ms Cheng will return to Hong Kong on April 29.
zh: 律政司司長鄭若驊資深大律師明日（四月二十六日）晚上啟程前往北京訪問。
在北京期間，鄭若驊將禮節性拜訪國務院港澳事務辦公室、國家發展和改革委員會、全國人民代表大會常務委員會法制工作委員會和香港特別行政區基本法委員會，以及司法部。
她亦會與內地仲裁業界代表會面，加強在法律及仲裁服務方面的交流。
鄭若驊將於四月二十九日返港。

Ms Cheng will return to Hong Kong on April 29.
